recipe.title: Tropical Shake
ingredients: 1 small papaya, peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped
1 mango, peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped
1 ripe banana, peeled and coarsely chopped
instructions: Combine the fruit in a blender and purée to break everything up. Add the milk, sugar, and ice; blend until thick and frothy.
